vsParam:
This day has finally arrived!
Peppermint's long-expected Christmas!

Tasty food! Tasty apples! I've been waiting for this day.
A day to eat yummy food to my heart's content! Heehee...

I heard that they offer more than food this year!
Someone in the Student Union told me...

There will be Christmas costumes
available in Hazel's shop!

What!? So, we'll get to see adorable girls in
Christmas costumes... Ouch!?

Humph, you're so stupid...
Just ignore this moron. Well...

Wistyria! Tell me more about it!
As a fashion lover, I just can't afford to miss it!

OK, Hazel said she prepared a lot of other things
in addition to Christmas costumes!

Oh yeah? I'm getting curious...
What does she have to offer?

But I lived beyond my means early this month...
I shouldn't have eaten the winter specialty of that restaurant...

Hehe.
Sorel, you ordered three plates for yourself back then.

Hey, Anise!? We had a deal to keep it a secret!
But the cuisines there were so delicious...

I got good news for you! There seems to be a way
to get a Christmas costume for free!

What is with you reacting like that every time? So rude.
Anyway, listen to me first!

You helped me gather ingredients for cuisines,
which I really appreciate!

So, I'll come straight to the point.
I hope you could do me another favor now.

Haha, I suppose we can't turn you down this time either...
What do you need then?

I hope you can prepare cuisines that may be in high demand,
as well as Christmasy items.

I placed many commissions.
Please complete them when you're available!
And back to how to get a costume for free...

We offer extra bonus points for this one. The more
commissions you complete, the more points you'll gain!
You can use these points to purchase your favorite stuff!

Yeah.
It's a reward for your hard work.

Great, Senpai!
Heehee, I'll try my best too!
